pages.text: $(li)Thanks to download the Ender's Journey modpack!$(br)$(li)If you find any bug, please, don't doubt to report it $(l:https://github.com/PreciseModpacker/enders_journey/issues)here$(/l)$(br)$(li)If it is your first time playing this modpack I strongly recommend you to read these pages before to start.

pages.title: Ender Dragon
pages.text: $(li)The Ender Dragon is becoming a latent threat in our world.$(br)$(li)If it gets enough power and gets into our dimension, it will be completely destroyed.$(br)$(li)You must go to the End and banish the Ender Dragon in the depths of the void before this happens.

pages.title: Ender Portal
pages.text: $(li)Accessing the End will not be an easy task.$(br)$(li)First, you will need to find 12 different $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/ender_eyes)Ender Eyes$(/l), each one is obtained in a different way.$(br)$(li)These artifacts will allow you to find and activate a portal that will connect our world with the End, thus allowing you to access it to fulfill your objective.

pages.title: Endernomicon
pages.text: $(li)The Endornomicon is an ancient book with arcane knowledge that will help you in your journey.
$(li)You can access to this book with the $(l)Endernomicon button$() located in your inventory.
$(li)Here, you will see multiple categories. At first some of them will be locked.
$(li)Inside of every category you will find entries related with that category.

$(li)As you explore the world, discover new dimensions, biomes and structures, find new items, slay creatures and craft items, the book entries will be unlocked little by little.$(br)$(li)This knowledge may be useful to you in your adventure.$(br)$(li)In a future you will learn how to $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/craft_endernomicon)craft this book$(/l) to unlock extra functions.
